page.title: 13RELIGION, ELMLEY CASTLE
page.content: Churches in Elmley Castle,Little Comberton and Bricklehampton belong to the same Church of England parish.Other denominations are catered for in Pershore.Congregations are small in spite of efforts by the vicar and his assistant,the Diocesan Agricultural Chaplain.A combined church choir has been formed and the church bells are being rung.The churches are in a good state of repair and there is no lack of support to raise money locally for church fabric. In the past three years Â£12,000 has been spent on Elmley Castle church and Â£9,000 on Little Comberton church.The stone walls surrounding the churchyards in Elmley Castle and Little Comberton have recently been rebuilt by the Manpower Services Commission.
